tool_description: Simple API 2022 to show all the climate changes around the world
name: Climate Change Startup
title: Climate Change Startup

api_list.name: Get Climate change news from a specified resource
api_list.description: Get Climate change news from a given site
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-startup.p.rapidapi.com/news/nyt"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-startup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change-startup.p.rapidapi.com/news/{newspaperid}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change-startup.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All the  CLimate change news
